```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## A table

```{r table1, echo = FALSE}
table1 %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```

## A table as DT

```{r table1-2, echo = FALSE}
airports %>% 
  DT::datatable()
```

## A plot

```{r plot-static}
mpg %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(displ, hwy))
```


## An interactive plot

```{r plot-dynamic}
p <-
  mpg %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(displ, hwy))

plotly::ggplotly(p)
```

```{r plot-dynamic-surround}
plotly::ggplotly(
  mpg %>% 
    ggplot() +
    geom_point(aes(displ, hwy))
)
```

```{r pairs}
d <- SharedData$new(iris)
p <- GGally::ggpairs(d, aes(color = Species), columns = 1:4)
highlight(ggplotly(p), on = "plotly_selected")
```
